settings.title: Can I contact you for sizing information?
settings.answer: Of course! Online shopping can be difficult and occasionally your measurements can fall between sizes. We can help you no matter what your sizing question may be. Submit your measurements through our contact form as well as the item(s) you’re interested in and we can advise!

settings.title: Do you have a storefront where I can try things on?
settings.answer: We do have pop up shops around North America. For a location nearest to you feel free to contact us!

settings.title: The style I want is on pre-order. What does this mean?
settings.answer: Pre-order items are items that we do not have currently on hand but can be purchased in advance for when they come back in stock.When you order a pre-order item, we will be following up with an approximate date when the product will ship

settings.title: How do I care for my garments?
settings.answer:
Each product has an inside label with detailed care instructions. Please follow these specific instructions as they are tailored to each individual piece and will ensure the piece’s longevity.

For most of our products made from cotton, the washing instructions are straightforward: wash with like colors in cold water and tumble dry on low, or air dry.

settings.title: When will my order ship?
settings.answer: We need 1-2 business days to pack and ship your full order. Orders placed after 10:00 pm PST on Friday or over the weekend, will ship on the next business day.

settings.title: Where do you ship to?
settings.answer: We ship worldwide! At the Cart stage, you can enter your shipping address for an estimate. We do not cover international duties - these duties can be paid on arrival.

settings.title: I have a question about my order, what should I do?
settings.answer: Reach out! Visit our contact page for any information regarding your order! We’re here to answer questions about Orders, Order Modifications, Shipping, Returns, & Cancellations.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.answer: You may return unworn, unwashed and unaltered items purchased from Moda for a full refund or store credit within 30 days of the purchase date. Please note that a “Final Sale” items cannot be returned.
